---
title: "Data and Tools"
---

We are developing a wide range of community tools and apps for ecosystem modellers and policy end-users our simulation data.

Please check our publication policy if you would like to use these data for peer-reviewed research.

#### FishMIP Explorer

Check out this Shiny app to visualise gridded or spatially aggregated data of projected changes in potential fish biomass, under alternative climate emission scenarios.

#### Regional Ecosystem Model Tools

R/Python tutorials for extracting regional-scale model inputs from global gridded Earth System Model outputs, using a regional shapefiles.
